title: Press Release
content:
Hello, I just wanted to let it be known that I've released a couple of the bitmap families I've created (and received terrific feedback for in the critique section of Typophile) over the last few years, in a new section of my portfolio site:   
   
 [http://www.glomerate.com/type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417171901/http:/www.glomerate.com/type)   
   
Thanks again.   
Andrew Childs
author: afo
